home.description: Calculating how many calories you need based on amount of activity and exercise per day, and the losing rate you want, also providing you advice.

guidePage.nav2nd: After the second week of dieting
guidePage.tryIt: Dieta Homepage → Try it (limited function). Then if you like it, sign up.
guidePage.signUp: Or sign up from Menu → Sign Up
guidePage.enter: Enter your weight and select the calorie deficit.
guidePage.selectLevel: select the strength level of activity and exercise. Find your level in the table.
guidePage.nutrition: Get your recommandation list of calorie and nutritions.
guidePage.restriction: Only for non-guest user, with the first time calculation finished.
guidePage.getAdvice: Fill in the average weight this and last week. Submit to see the suggestion.
guidePage.adjustment: Decide your deficit next week based on the suggestion, your circumstances. Increasing the deficit means speed up the losing rate, vise versa.
guidePage.resultOriented: Instead of re-calculating calorie with weight of this week, we make adjustion with the result of last week - a result oriented step.
guidePage.selectLevelAgain: Select strengh level of activity and exercise just like you did last week.
guidePage.tipLoad: Tip: Click "Load setting of last week" to get your record. You can also modify it after clicking.
guidePage.againRoute: Re-start it from: Navbar → Menu → Start Diet.
guidePage.againDuring: After the second week, go to: Navbar → Menu → During Diet.

weight.question: How many calories would you like to reduce?

nutrition.title: {{name}}, your daily recommended intakes are:
nutrition.warning: {{name}}, this recommandation isn't suit you, please consult with your doctor before starting a diet.
nutrition.buttonGuest: Sign up now to save calculation result!

result.fast: A little bit too fast, keep watching it.
result.slow: Keep trying, you just need more practice.

suggestion1.normal: If you have been losing weight with this rate over 3 -4weeks, a 2 - 7 day "break" are suggested.
suggestion1.fast: If you have been losing weight with this rate over 2 - 3 weeks, highly recommend you to take a week "break".
suggestion1.slow: Try to record your calorie with more accuracy, and have a steady deficit every day.

suggestion2.normal: Add 200 - 400 Kcal per day during break.
suggestion2.fast: Add 300 - 500 Kcal per day during break.
suggestion2.slow: If the above two things you are doing right, and you are stuck here for more than 2 weeks, than speed up.
